main event: Multiple Army and USAF personnel, as well as enlisted men, reported a UFO sighting at Camp Hood, Texas on 23 July 1948.
interesting points: The UFO was described as round with a tail and had a white color with a tint of blue-green.
It was spotted at an altitude of 30Â° in the northwest direction, resembling an 'Evening Star'.
The observation lasted only 3 seconds, and there was no mention of photographs or signatures.
Multiple sources in the same general area reported the sighting, adding to its credibility.
The report is marked as 'UNCLASSIFIED', indicating it was not considered a significant security threat at the time.
witnesses: Army and USAF personnel, enlisted men
